definition: muscle/tendon/veins visible under the skin/sth resembling tendons or veins (e.g. fiber in a vegetable)
to be a real headache/to find sth a real headache/to beat one's brains
body weary, strength exhausted (idiom); extremely tired/spent
to play rubber band jump rope

sentences.english: The most common form of web reinforcement used is the vertical stirrup.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的形式箍筋採用的是垂直箍筋。

sentences.english: The most common form of web reinforcement used is the vertical stirrup.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的形式箍筋採用的是垂直箍筋。

sentences.english: PC 6 is exactly opposite, on the inner forearm between the two tendons.
sentences.chinese: 籌委會6剛好相反筋，對兩者之間的內在前臂。

sentences.english: Plantar fasciitis is one of the most common causes of inferior heel pain.
sentences.chinese: 足底筋膜炎是造成足跟底部疼痛最常見的原因之一。

sentences.english: To remove the foreleg, cut through the hide and tendons AT the joint closest to the foot.
sentences.chinese: 除去前腿時要通過皮和筋在腳的關節處切下去。

sentences.english: Then lengthen your tailbone and sacrum as your thighbones descend toward your hamstrings.
sentences.chinese: 然後，拉伸你的尾骨和骶骨，大腿骨沉向腿筋。

sentences.english: Bend forward slightly at the hip, keeping your back straight, until you feel a slight stretch in your hamstrings.
sentences.chinese: 保持背部平直慢慢俯身，直到感覺腿筋拉緊。

sentences.english: Electrical activity was 11% greater for the hamstring and calf muscles while wearing the EasyTones.
sentences.chinese: 腿筋和腿肚肌肉的感應器活動幅度則要大11%。

sentences.english: I first assault immediately to the best-off gluten.
sentences.chinese: 我先衝鋒最好馬上來個斷筋。

sentences.english: This paper provides an experiment basis for studying mechanism of geobelt reinforced crushed gravel soil further.
sentences.chinese: 爲進一步研究土工帶素碎石土加筋機理提供試驗基礎。

sentences.english: The formula of drawing force for cold-drawn inner fin tube is derived with slab method in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 採用工程法推導了冷拔內直筋管拔制力的計算公式。

sentences.english: The plackets of the stirrups should be settled right on the upper part of the beams and in staggered arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 梁的箍筋的開口必須放在梁的上部且應交錯放置。

sentences.english: A new layout of prestressed cables in concrete frame spandrel beams is present.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種混凝土框架邊梁預應力筋的新束型。

sentences.english: The effect of stirrups and plates on SRC joint has also been discussed.
sentences.chinese: 文中還論證了節點箍筋的作用和錨板錨固性能。

sentences.english: Trim and slice turkey giblets. Mix in seasoning and marinate for 15 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 火雞腎去筋，切片，拌入調味料醃15分鐘。

sentences.english: The old veteran could tire out the most robust sportsman.
sentences.chinese: 這位久經沙場的老將能把最強壯的運動員拖得筋疲力。
